title: Star Guardian Icon from Quiz
body: So i took the "what Star Guardian are you?" quiz and it gave me an icon... i''m just not sure how to put it on.... Can any one help me please?

replies.body: It won't give it to you right away, give it about 5 years and you should get it then.
You'll receive the icon in a gift. Just give it some time to get sent.
Just wait for riot to send you it ingame, and u can just equip it like any other icon.
